com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.configuration

Interface ServerEncryptionOptions.Builder

  • Enclosing interface:
    ServerEncryptionOptions

    public static interface ServerEncryptionOptions.Builder
    Builds instances of type ServerEncryptionOptions. Initialize attributes and then invoke the build() method to create an instance.

    ServerEncryptionOptionsBuilder is not thread-safe and generally should not be stored in a field or collection, but instead used immediately to create instances.

    Author:
    Dmytro Nosan
